title: Ludlow Gables Apartments
map_address: 2910 Ludlow Rd near S. Woodland Rd
posting_body: This over sized and newly updated 1 bedroom suite has tons of natural light.
High VAULTED ceilings, new granite counter tops.
The soft closing cabinets flows beautifully with the ceramic tile.
Samsung stainless steel appliances refrigerator, stove and dishwasher.
Flawless refinished hardwood floors cover the rest of the suite along with fresh paint.
This suite has the best bathroom in town with new ceramic tile wrapping the walls and floor in the bathroom.
The vanity, medicine cabinet, and even the toilet paper holder is new!
The suite gets a ton a naturally light and FREE heat water and sewer.

You will also be surrounded with several diverse restaurants, you will have you pick of Hungarian, Japanese, French, Seafood and Soul food, Cuisine, Pizza, Coffee Shop, Movie theater, Grocery Store and so much more!

Transportation has never been easier with the RTA rapid that runs, through Shaker Square to Downtown, Cleveland State, Cleveland Clinic, University Hospital, JACK Casino, Rock-N-Roll hall of fame, Airport and many other popular places.
